instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1398: What is A1398? A1398 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2015, Mid 2012, Early 2013, Late 2013, Mid 2014 with EMC 2909, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00138, 820-00163, 820-00426, 820-3332, 820-3662, 820-3787..

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina
threads.message: Any advice on how to replace lcd lvds cable on retina 15 screen 2012?  Do I need to take off the glass? I cannot find videos on youtube.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina
threads.message: No, same as every other retina

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina
threads.message: 5 minute job. All <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> LCD cables are identical too. Just slide off the hinge cover.

threads.title: [SOLVED]Replace lcd cable <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1398</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> retina
threads.message: Thanks. It is pretty easy yes. Done
